title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2304/94 of 26 September 1994 providing for the partial release of minimum stocks in the sugar sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2304/94 of 26 September 1994 providing for the partial release of minimum stocks in the sugar sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The percentages referred to in points (a) and (b) of Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 1789/81 are hereby reduced to 3 % for the period starting 1 September 1994.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 September 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
